customer_reviews.title: Did not clean all residue - Contains polluting Micro-Beads
customer_reviews.text: I was not impressed by the performance of this cleaner. I had a hard time finding something to clean the glass cooktop and now will move on to find something better. I am not happy to discover that this product uses plastic particles to aid in scrubbing. For all the facial scrubs or body scrubs, toothpaste, what have you, where micro-plastic beads are most commonly found, add this to a list of brands, I will now boycott. Micro-beads are polluting our waterways and should be banned from all products. Google this subject to learn more about it. Its one of many growing environmental concerns affecting our oceans and waterways.
